Head of Data ScienceBusiness Management ConsultancyNew Jersey (remote friendly)$160,000 - $200,000 + bonus + benefitsTHE COMPANYThis is consulting firm that is looking for a Head of Data Science that will be involved in leading the Data Science team. The firm believes in smart analytics and is looking for someone who can push the boundaries of Data Science and practice creative/deep thinking. They are a rapidly expanding team and are looking to increase their team by 2.5x by the end of this year.RESPONSIBILITIES· Lead the Data Science Team· Involved with Direct Marketing product designed to create a unique way to personalizemarketing campaigns for clients· Working closely with a customer success officer (client-facing)· Handling the backend of the algorithm development and who can see a vision beyond justthe model· Enhancing the state of the product and continuing to upgrade the model and understandwhat each client needs· Applying new algorithms to new clients and specializing the product for the specific clientSKILLS AND EXPERIENCE· Strong communication skills and ability to present findings/results to both technical and non-technical audiences· Management experience required. Minimum Master’s degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics or a related field· Demonstrated track record of working in a collaborative, multi-disciplinary team wheresuccess depends on the contributions of everyone· Experience with direct marketing and client-facing work· Strong predictive modeling, and statistical analytics skills· Familiarity with project handling and working through several projects at a time· Involvement with strategy and creative assignment, rather than just execution· Ability to think outside of the box and have a vision to expand where the product is at· Prior experience with recommendation engines is a plus· Prior experience with Azure is a plus· Proficiency in Python is a mustBENEFITSThe compensation package is a combination of the base salary, bonus, and benefits.HOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your CV via the Apply link on this page.KEY TERMSData Science, Models, Machine Learning, Python, Consulting, Management Consulting, Direct Marketing, Creative Thinking, Python, Azure, Client Facing, Product
